Starstomp:
They weren't really friends... Just plain jerks. I was the only girl back 
there, so I had to learn how to defend myself... Besides, except for my 
looks, they never really appreciated me. I wont miss them. In fact, (she 
looks at Winlord straigth in his eyes) I could enjoy it here!
